name: Capitalism 2
description: This script will help to install Capitalism 2 (standalone) with newest available patch 1.14.
notes:
Important:
Please install this game in default directory.
If installation directory is different than:
- polish version: C:\Program Files (x86)\Capitalism II PL\
- english version: C:\Program Files (x86)\Capitalism II\
you should select correct directory manually or this script will not extract patch correctly.
---------------------------------------------------------
Patch 1.14 improves compatibility with newest version of Windows operating systems and also fixes a bug with bad drawing of graphical interface on Linux - tested on Wine 5.4 and Wine 5.5.
Important!
If you have "a non-english version" of this game - for example Capitalism 2 from polish magazine "Komputer Świat Gry Extra - nr 2/2004" - some translation of buttons in Main Menu will probably gone - please look at screenshots.

files.installer: N/A:Select the Setup executable from your CD:

options./drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Capitalism: Polish version (Komputer Świat Gry Extra - nr 2/2004)

content:
files:
- patch: http://enlight.b-cdn.net/cap2/Cap2_v114.zip
- installer: 'N/A:Select the Setup executable from your CD:'
game:
  arch: win64
  exe: $GAMEDIR/$INPUT_EXEDIR/Cap2.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- input_menu:
    description: 'Choose the game''s version:'
    id: EXEDIR
    options:
    - /drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Capitalism II: English version
    - /drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Capitalism II PL: "Polish version (Komputer \u015A\
        wiat Gry Extra - nr 2/2004)"
    preselect: /drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Capitalism II
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win64
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- extract:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/$INPUT_EXEDIR/
    file: patch
